oo few. The dropoff age is important, too. The overall slow down 
is

ause the networks grow in size and the simpler species reach 
their

off age and get killed of by NEAT. This is the explanation why

ss drops, too. You can have an absolute elitism where the

ever get killed, no matter how old it is. It seems

au is being reached and NEAT finds it difficult to

plex are left.

ure generations. 


Could you be kind enough to explain how speciation para=
meters work in 
NEAT? What if I change these parameters? And should there b=
e a 
general rule to determine the parameters, in what manner do they vary =

in different problems?

tion, but I think 
there should be a principle to select approximate values=

different problems need different parameter settings, so how woul=

r to double-pole balancing, both need

ings of the DPM, the fitness
